entry.question: Is Banzaitron a Leader if I have an Autobot head on a Decepticon body?
Is Banzaitron a Leader if I have him, a Decepticon, and a Mercenary on my starting team?
Does Banzaitron’s flip-to-Alt ability work with Hunker Down?
entry.answer: If you put an Armor on him with Hunker Down, and it doesn’t scrap before you have resolved his flip-to-Alt ability, you will get to do the effect because the “if Armor” clause isn’t until after the arrow.
